BeautifyPic.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: fmu.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BeautifyPic

    "RspImgType": "url"
}

BeautifyVideo.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: fmu.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BeautifyVideo
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Url": "abc",
    "BeautyParam": [
        {
            "WhitenLevel": 1,
            "SmoothingLevel": 1,
            "EyeEnlargeLevel": 1,
            "FaceShrinkLevel": 1
        }
    ],
    "OutputVideoType": "abc"
}
BeautifyVideo.title: 调用返回成功
